description: From Middle English *houswyfely, *houswijfli, *houswiflich, suggested by houswifliche (adverb), equivalent to housewife +‎ -ly.

adjectives.description: housewifely (comparative more housewifely, superlative most housewifely)

examples: […]  to make the yong women sobre minded, to loue their husbands to loue their children, to be discrete, chaste, housewifely, good and obediente vnto theyr owne husbands  […]
